title: How to Ekko (Bronze Edition)

embed.description: Abit of Ekko tank, it is really strong in Season 6 Patch 6.8. I would highly recommend anyone to play as tank ekko, had LOADS of fun playing him :D! Hope you guys enjoy this montage!!

body:
Hey guys, made a little Funtage :D, Hope you guys enjoy!!

Any bit of feedback is appreciated :)!
